metadata.dc:description: The present report reviews the problem of depression in children by means of an interview made by a pediatric to two paidopsychiatrists: concept, incidence, etiology and clinic, emphasizing un those features of interest and related to the pediatric and based on a bibliographic revision and the own experience of the authors, referring fifty cases of recent study. It is also showed the main exploratory and diagnosis methods: psychological, clinical and biological, as the evolution, treatment and some aspects of suicide in children.
metadata.dc:title: Las depresiones infantiles. Entrevista entre un pediatra extrahospitalario y dos paidopsiquiatras.
[Childhood depressions. Interview between a non-hospital affiliated pediatrician and 2 child psychiatrists].
